data.name: Sprint Vector - OST
data.detailed_description:
Turn your speakers up to Overdrive with the Sprint Vector Double Album OST, featuring the entire adrenaline-fueled tracklist produced by rising songsmith Spencer Kitagawa! The OST comes with 43 songs that'll get your blood pumping just like you're standing at the starting line awaiting the command of maniacal media mastermind, Mr. Entertainment. Pop it on and get ready to move to the beat!

Comes with WAV and MP3 320 kbps formats.


TRACKLIST:

Mr. Entertainment Presents...Entertainment Overdrive
01 - Sprint Vector Theme
02 - Hyper Toxins
03 - City Escape
04 - Acid Bubble Pop
05 - Nebula Crab
06 - Pharaoh’s Lust
07 - Northern Chill
08 - Watch the Ooze
09 - Intergalactica
10 - Event Horizon
11 - Fireworks
12 - GAS!
13 - Mega-Skate
14 - Matterhorn
15 - Gloo
16 - Factory Fire
17 - Jackpot Jive
18 - Low Orbit
19 - Big Drip
20 - Sludgewave
21 - Yeti Punch
22 - Highlights

05 - Aether Infinity
06 - Cloudjump
07 - Pyramids at Night

10 - Sunrise Sunset

13 - Downshift
14 - Hachi Machi!
15 - Like Water
16 - Slide
17 - Snow Bunny
18 - Dry Danger

21 - Valley of the Kings

data.short_description: Turn your speakers up to Overdrive with the Sprint Vector OST -- jam-packed as a double album with 43 songs that'll get your blood pumping just like you're standing at the starting line awaiting the command of maniacal media mastermind, Mr. Entertainment.
